attributes.action: A Knighthood for Harry Bellinge. In addition to his MBE.
attributes.additional_details: I think Parliament need to ensure this hero gets the proper recognition he deserves.
attributes.background: Harry Bellinge was one of the first soldiers to land on D Day. He is a survivor and a national hero. He has raised £1 for every person lost on that awful day. The Government decided his lifelong work was worth an MBE. I think this humble war hero should be knighted.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
